title: Inflexion 1.1
description:
Inflexion is a multifunctional Video tool for converting many different video formats into h264 encoded MP4 or MKV containers.

It is capable of handling a huge mass of files.
There is also an upload function for Youtube and some useful audio-actions for fast converting or the extraction of audio-tracks from movies.

Since V. 1.1 it is possible to capture DirectShow devices like Webcams or Capture-Cards which makes Inflexion a great all-in-one tool for Youtubers from all over the world.

As soon as Inflexion 2 will be released, this version will become Open-Source.
